title: In Iraq, The Final Battle For Tikrit Is Likely To Be The Hardest
teaser: The offensive against ISIS in Tikrit is being eyed by Iraq's various factions â€” including some the U.S. hopes will help take on ISIS elsewhere. NPR's Rachel Martin talks with Deborah Amos in Iraq.
